title: Amelia Rose Towers
creator_credit: Jackie Farkas, Nicole Sorby and AFTRS
brief_description: This multi-award winning Australian short film is distinctly theatrical with its background of rap and parade of surrealist images. The atmosphere is acute and claustrophobic, full of anxiety, fear and loathing. Amelia Rose Towers, whose initials spell ART, faces an adversary who spells MAN, and offers us fragmented glimpses of her own fragile identity.
